title: Karmayogi email spam
selftext: Does anybody know what this Karmayogi is? I don’t know why they sent this to me(a few more emails like this). Absolutely no idea why a gov.in email would keep spamming people. I don’t even live in India any longer.
comments:
This seems like a case of someone mistakenly submitting a wrong email address, rather than intentional spam.    
Karmayogi is a portal for government officers to undergo mid-career training and upskilling.
Looks like it. I replied and they responded that someone used my email with some other number. I told them to delete my email.
